Message.Msg: Re: Re: Re: Google illegal money making machine: stealing from inventors/investors & distributing among US agencies By casp321 . Nov 20, 2012 5:58 PM Pelosi seeks input from diverse array of confidants Zachary Coile, Chronicle Washington Bureau Published 4:00 a.m., Tuesday, December 19, 2006 Financier Bill Hambrecht, former state Senate leader John Burton and Democratic Rep. George Miller of Martinez are just a few of the insiders who make up House Speaker-to-be Pelosi's circle of advisers and confidants. Not surprisingly, the list includes many of the Bay Area's best-known power brokers, from former San Francisco Mayor Willie Brown to California Sen. Barbara Boxer to Rep. Anna Eshoo of Palo Alto, who is one of Pelosi's closest friends in Congress. "We've known each other for 30 years," said Eshoo, who met Pelosi at a party fundraiser at the Atherton home of Madeleine Haas Russell. "It was long before either of us were elected to Congress. ... We were mothers; we were both involved in the community and in the Democratic Party. We had many commonalities." Pelosi's circle is filled with Silicon Valley heavyweights. She has long-standing ties to investment banker Sandy Robertson and venture capitalists Tom Perkins and John Doerr. More recently, she befriended Google founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin, ??????????????? Re: Re: Re: Google illegal money making machine: stealing from inventors/investors & distributing among US agencies By casp321 . Nov 20, 2012 5:51 PM . Google should not be accused of "unfair" acts: lawmakers Reuters – Mon, Nov 19, 2012 Anna Eshoo, on the Energy and Commerce Committee, and Zoe Lofgren, who is on the Judiciary Committee, said there were reports to suggest the FTC planned to use the unfair standard to avoid proving some elements required in an antitrust claim. -------- Want a voice in Washington? Invest in a politician December 12, 2010 | Modified: March 19, 2012 Finally, Paul Pelosi Jr., Nancy's only son, works for Bill Hambrecht at WR Hambrecht. Pelosi's office didn't return a phone call, but Hambrecht did. I asked him if his ties to Pelosi earned him the hearing. He said Pelosi was motivated only by "genuine desire to find a private-sector solution" to unemployment. Hambrecht added that Democratic Rep. Anna Eshoo, whose Silicon Valley district includes many start-ups, was the real prime mover. ----------------------- Re: Re: Google illegal money making machine: stealing from inventors/investors & distributing among US agencies By casp321 . Nov 20, 2012 5:43 PM Hambrecht, Paul husband of Nancy congresswoman, ... Google should not be accused of "unfair" acts: lawmakers Reuters – Mon, Nov 19, 2012 WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Two lawmakers urged the Federal Trade Commission on Monday to steer clear of expanding its authority as it investigates allegations search engine company Google violated antitrust law. The two California Democrats in the House of Representatives, who count Google as a major campaign contributor, asked the FTC not to accuse the company of "unfair" acts if it believes it broke antitrust law. Anna Eshoo, on the Energy and Commerce Committee, and Zoe Lofgren, who is on the Judiciary Committee, said there were reports to suggest the FTC planned to use the unfair standard to avoid proving some elements required in an antitrust claim.

Topic.Title: ON2 Shareholders: I want you know it too!

Message.Msg: Come, whoever you are! Wanderer, worshipper, lover of leaving. This is not a caravan of despair. It doesn't matter if you've broken your vow a thousand times, still and yet again come! ~Rumi Why should I stay at the bottom of a well, when a strong rope is in my hand? ~Rumi Why do you stay in prison when the door is so wide open? ~Rumi As you start to walk out on the way, the way appears. ~Rumi You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life? ~Rumi ...smiles come best from those who weep. Lightning, then the rain-laughter. ~Rumi I have lived on the lip of insanity, wanting to know reasons, knocking on a door. It opens. I've been knocking from the inside! ~Rumi Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion. ~Rumi Gamble everything for love, if you're a true human being. If not, leave this gathering. ~Rumi Love is a madman, working his wild schemes, tearing off his clothes, running through the mountains.... ~Rumi You've been walking the ocean's edge, holding up your robes to keep them dry. You must dive naked under, and deeper under, a thousand times deeper! ~Rumi All religions, all this singing, one song. The differences are just illusion and vanity. The sun's light looks a little different on this wall than it does on that wall, and a lot different on this other one, but it's still one light. ~Rumi Even when tied in a thousand knots, the string is still but one. ~Rumi You go from village to village on your horse asking everyone, "Has anyone seen my horse?" ~Rumi

Message.Msg: 11/21/2012 Equity Brief: US District Court Officially Enters Judgment in Favor of Vringo Press Release: Equity Brief – 54 minutes ago Newly filed documents show that the US district court in Norfolk VA has entered the official judgment in favor of Vringo (VRNG). This afternoon the court entered its judgement confirming the Nov 6th Jury award in the AOL, Google et al. case with respect to the Defendants` infringement of the asserted claims of U.S. Patent Nos. 6,314,420 (the "`420 Patent") and 6,775,664 (the "`664 Patent").
